title: [Champion Concept] Mulark, the Frozen One
body:
Please leave a Comment, Reply, any Feed Back or Thoughts on this Concept down bellow, i look forward to reading what you leave down in the Comment section

Primary: Support. 
Secondary: Mage. 
Additional Roles: Player Choice. 
Statistics: Attack Power: 2. Defense Power: 6. Ability Power: 6. Difficulty: 8.
**Place of Origins:** Freljord.
**Upon Selection:** the living shall know my pain.

Health: 369(+31). Health Regen.: 2.1(+0.38)
Mana: 256 (+30). Mana Regen.: 2.0(+0.37)
Range: 520(Range). Attack Damage: 26(+1.7)
Armor: 14(+2.1). Magic Res.: 30(+0)
Attack Speed: 0.630(+2.2%). Move. Speed: 342.

**Friends:** {{champion:127}}.
**Enemies:** {{champion:201}} & {{champion:22}}.

**Appearance:** Mulark is a 5â€™ft tall skeleton that has large shackles on his neck, wrist & ankles each connected by a chain. There are several pieces of torn of fabric that cover his left arm, his right leg & around his neck bellow the neck shackle, now his right arm & left leg are encased in a small amount of ice while his back has several different length icicle growing out.

**Summoner Spells:**
{{summoner:4}} & {{summoner:7}}.

**Item Builds:**
**Starting Items:**
{{item:2003}}/{{item:3303}}/{{item:2044}}/{{item:3341}}.
**Essential Items:**
{{item:2049}}/{{item:3092}}/{{item:3270}}.
**Offensive Items:**
{{item:3025}}/{{item:3116}}/{{item:3027}}/{{item:3174}}.
**Defensive Items:**
{{item:3102}}/{{item:3065}}/{{item:3110}}/{{item:3143}}.

***Passive: Cold As Ice.***
after Mulark has activated an Ability he will shroud himself in a vial of freezing cold air for 3 seconds. while this Passive is active all of Mulark's Basic Attacks will deal 70(+5pts per Lv.)(+5% bonus AP) Magic Damage & will Slow the targets Movement Speed by 15% for 1.25 seconds & continued Basic Attacks against a Slowed target will Refresh the Slow. after this Passive's duration has ended it will then go on a 6 second Cool Down.

***Q-Ability: Sheer Cold.*** 
Range: 450. 
Cool Down: 18.5/18/17.5/17/16.5.
Cost: 100.
Magic Damage: 55/65/75/85/95(+40% bonus AP).
**Activate:** after Mulark has chosen a single enemy Champion within this Abilities Casting Range then upon its activation Mulark will conjure up a large orb of ice, after creating the orb Mulark will hurl it at the chosen target dealing Magic Damage to the target while Slowing the targets Movement Speed by 30% for 1.25 seconds. if any other enemy Champions are within 200-radius of the affected Champion the orb will start bouncing between the additional enemy Champions & the initial target 4 times, if the orb hits an already Slowed target then the Slows duration is Refreshed.

***W-Ability: Hail Storm.*** 
Range: 450. 
Cool Down: 13/12.5/12/11.5/11.
Cost: 45 per tick.
Magic D.O.T: 20/25/30/35/40(+30% bonus AP).
**Activate:** after Mulark has chosen a 200-radius location within this Abilities Casting Range then upon its activation Mulark will create a small cloud in the sky that will shower hail, for the next 2 seconds the hail will deal Magic Damage every 0.5 seconds while also reducing all enemy Champions Attack Speed by 30% while they remain in the radius while also having their Armor being Reduced by 10%. If an enemy Tower is within the hails radius then the tower cannot attack any allied Champions while this Ability is active.

***E-Ability: Chilling Touch.*** 
Range: 450. 
Cool Down: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12.
Cost: 50/60/70/80/90.
Magic Damage: 45/75/105/135/165(+50% bonus AP).
**Activate:** after Mulark has chosen a 150-radius location within this Abilities Casting Range then upon its activation Mulark will have ice erupt within the radius, if any enemies are within the radius upon its activation they will be dealt Magic Damage & will be Stunned for 1.25 seconds. while a target is Stunned they will be frozen to the bone making them very fragile increasing an damage that Mulark or an allied Champion deals by 5% for the duration of the Stun.

***R-Ability: Watchers Apparition.*** 
Range: Self-Cast. 
Cool Down: 190/180/170.
Cost: 110.
Magic Damage: 55/75/95(+40% bonus AP).
Heal: 195/295/395(+20% bonus AP).
**Activate:** after activating this Ability Mulark will create a ghostly apparition of a Watcher to fight for him, this Watcher will remain active for 8.75 seconds & will stay next to Mulark. While the Watcher is active it will shoot a spear of ice from its 6 hands that will attack 6 random targets within 350-radius of Mulark dealing Magic Damage every 0.75 seconds, if an enemy Champion takes 3 attacks from the Watcher then that Champion will be encased in ice being Stunned for 1 second this effect cannot affect the same target more than once every 3 seconds. When the duration of the Watcher ends it will turn into pure ice magic that Mulark can drain to Heal Himself with.

First time trawling the concept board and it's incredible to see the thought put into champion concepts! 

For Mulark in particular, it'd be helpful to understand what is the champion's motive. Why is he a short, chained skeleton from the Freljord? How does that relate to his ability to manipulate ice? Providing that context will strengthen this idea for others - and yourself! Having a clear goal is super useful when iterating on a design because you can check your work against it and see if you're accomplishing what you set out to do or adjust your goals.

Some other feedback...
W - Inhibiting enemy turrets sounds cool!
R - Although this champion is connected to Lissandra, the mechanic of this is really close to her ult. How can this be differentiated?

But for your sake i will make a brief summarize of Mulark's history:
During the time of the Watchers people would often been "sacrificed" to these beings in exchange they will not bring harm to their villages, Mulark (real name forgotten) was 1 of these "sacrifices" that the Watchers used to amuse themselves with to kill a very VERY small portion of their boredom. as Mulark was amusing the Watchers they notice that he was capable of utilizing very minimal ice magic which kept him alive a lot longer then most of the other "sacrificed" ones but eventually he died. after years of being dead his soul still hungered for revenge not only against the Watchers but against those who made him the "sacrifice", now reunited with the remains of his body & using the cold powers of the Watchers he seeks vengeance.

Hi Jack!  This is another solid champion concept from you, as usual.  I do think Mulark plays it a little safe, though.  Most of his abilities are rehashed versions of existing ones, which isn't necessarily a bad thing but overall I think you could push him a bit further.

Passive- Giving stacking resistances to a ranged magey support doesn't make much sense.  This would work better if he was melee, and would also synergize better with the magic damage on next auto component.

Q- A slowing version of Fiddlesticks' crows.  I like it, especially because that's a neat mechanic that isn't used anywhere else right now.

W- Having an infinite cast time tied to mana is very scary when you put it next to its interactions with towers.  I really like the theming here and the ability to dive.  What if instead, casting the storm on top of a tower reduced its target acquisition range?  Then you could harass near or even under a tower with someone like Vayne or Quinn without getting hit by the tower.  I'd also give it a designated cast time of 3-5 seconds.

E- This seems like a pretty bland Nami E rehash.  Not too excited about this one and I don't really see how it interacts with the rest of the kit.

R- A combination of Lissandra ult and Bard ult, yeah?  Pretty interesting concept and it could actually work decently well.  I'm just afraid that it's too similar to Lissandra in terms of both theme and mechanical execution.  Not sure if there's a way around this, though.

By the way, have you seen my [Mega Thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/uuQxluoH-lutzburgs-champion-concepts-mega-thread?show=flat) lately?  Last night I finished uploading the last one of my backlogged concepts- I'm finally finished!  I saved some really cool ones for last, including Rafa, Galahad and Doran.  Check them out and send them some love if you get the chance!
